timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            - If using Powershell , execute `-D` parameters in double quotes
          
          
            
            - If using Powershell , wrap `-D` parameters in double quotes
timeline.author: gastaldi
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -83,6 +85,22 @@ mvn io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin:{quarkus-version}:create \
 cd getting-started
 ----
 
+For windows users
+
+- If using cmd , (don't use forward slash `\`)
+
+[source,shell,subs=attributes+]
+----
+mvn io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin:{quarkus-version}:create -DprojectGroupId=org.acme -DprojectArtifactId=getting-started -DclassName="org.acme.quickstart.GreetingResource" -Dpath="/hello"
+----
+
+- If using Powershell , execute `-D` parameters in double quotes

timeline.message:
Update getting-started.adoc for windows

Edit commands for cmd & powershell on windows
